title: Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2023 on complex reasoning using pre-trained language models
note: PLMs), focusing on knowledge-augmented methods, few-shot prompting, neuro-symbolic methods, and rationale-based methods:

title: Language Models as Knowledge Bases?
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2019 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: ERNIE: Enhanced Language Representation with Informative Entities
container-title: *Proceedings of the 58th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL)*

title: K-BERT: Enabling Language Representation with Knowledge Graph
container-title: *Proceedings of the 34th AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI)*

title: KG-BERT: BERT for Knowledge Graph Completion with Text
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2022 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: KEPLER: A Unified Model for Knowledge Embedding and Pre-trained Language Representation
container-title: *Transactions of the Association for Computational Linguistics (TACL)*

title: Language Models are Few-Shot Learners
container-title: *Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS)*

title: Exploiting Cloze Questions for Few-Shot Text Classification and Natural Language Inference
container-title: *Proceedings of the 16th Conference of the European Chapter of the Association for Computational Linguistics (EACL)*

title: Making Pre-trained Language Models Better Few-shot Learners
container-title: *Proceedings of the 59th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL)*

title: The Power of Scale for Parameter-Efficient Prompt Tuning
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2021 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: Calibrate Before Use: Improving Few-Shot Performance of Language Models
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2022 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: Neuro-Symbolic Concept Learner: Interpreting Scenes, Words, and Sentences from Natural Supervision
container-title: *Proceedings of the 7th International Conference on Learning Representations (ICLR)*

title: Neural-Symbolic VQA: Disentangling Reasoning from Vision and Language Understanding
container-title: *Advances in Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS)*

title: Neural Symbolic Machines: Learning Semantic Parsers on Freebase with Weak Supervision
container-title: *Proceedings of the 55th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL)*

title: NS-CL: Neural-Symbolic Concept Learner
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2021 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: Neuro-Symbolic Reinforcement Learning with First-Order Logic
container-title: *Proceedings of the 36th AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI)*

title: e-SNLI: Natural Language Inference with Natural Language Explanations
container-title: *Proceedings of the 32nd Conference on Neural Information Processing Systems (NeurIPS)*

title: Explain Yourself! Leveraging Language Models for Commonsense Reasoning
container-title: *Proceedings of the 57th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL)*

title: Attention is not not Explanation
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2019 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: ERASER: A Benchmark to Evaluate Rationalized NLP Models
container-title: *Proceedings of the 58th Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics (ACL)*

title: Make Up Your Mind! Adversarial Generation of Inconsistent Natural Language Explanations
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2021 Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing (EMNLP)*

title: These articles cover a range of methods and approaches to enhance the reasoning capabilities of PLMs, providing a comprehensive overview of the current state of research in this area
